Description.Text: Location This popular apartment complex is centrally situated in Puerto Pollensa, just one street from the seafront promenade. The nearest fine-sand beach lies within metres of the apartments. Countless shops and entertainment venues are also located in the immediate vicinity. Facilities Guests can take the lift to reach the upper floors quickly and easily. Amenities include a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access is available in public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a café and a bar. A TV room is also among the amenities at the hotel. Other services include medical assistance. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area (for a fee). Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating, a kitchen and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. The accommodation units each feature separate bedrooms. A safe is also available. A kitchenette equipped with a fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment can be found in each accommodation unit. A telephone, a TV and wireless internet access are provided as standard. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols on the sun terrace offer a great way to relax. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Those wishing to enjoy sports whilst on holiday can have fun on-site with cycling/mountain biking and horse riding. For a fee, golf is also available. With diving, and for a fee, water skiing, windsurfing and sailing, fans of watersports will have plenty of options to choose from. The hotel offers indoor sporting opportunities in the form of a gym. Entertainment options and leisure facilities include an entertainment programme for adults and live music. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, dinner and half board. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.
